title: The Week Ling Gray Became a Hero
summary: Ling Gray, normally a counselor, uses her skills to avert a crisis in her city, gaining new powers along the way.
summaryGerman: Ling Gray, normalerweise eine Beraterin, nutzt ihre Fähigkeiten, um eine Krise in ihrer Stadt zu verhindern und gewinnt dabei neue Kräfte.
summaryDutch: Ling Gray, normaal gesproken een counselor, gebruikt haar vaardigheden om een crisis in haar stad te voorkomen, en verwerft onderweg nieuwe krachten.
summaryFrench: Ling Gray, habituellement conseillère, utilise ses compétences pour éviter une crise dans sa ville, tout en acquérant de nouveaux pouvoirs.

story.text: Ling Gray, a dedicated motivator and counselor, discovered she could hear the inner fears and desires of people around her. This new realization left her both shocked and curious.
Excited by her new abilities, Ling experimented with her power at work, subtly using her insights to guide her clients towards overcoming their fears.
Ling felt her powers growing stronger as she helped a young couple save their marriage, allowing her to not only hear but also soothe their emotional turmoil.
A local crisis emerged when a fire broke out near a crowded mall. Ling rushed to the scene, using her abilities to calm the crowd and coordinate a successful evacuation.
Her heroics made the news, and Ling was celebrated as a local hero. She was happy but realized that her life would never be the same again.
During a moment of reflection, Ling decided to use her powers for greater societal good, planning to offer free group counseling sessions using her unique abilities.
Ling spent the day with friends and family who supported her new journey. They discussed the potential of her powers, ending the week on a hopeful note.

ending: And so, Ling Gray embraced her role as a counselor and hero, ready to face whatever challenges lied ahead.
moral: Great power brings great responsibility, but also the opportunity to make a significant difference in the lives of others.
